<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Revivification Protocol](/Feats.aspx?ID=2475) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You have the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

</column>

---

Your nanites are programmed to automatically revive you. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.
name: Revivification Protocol
